description: This file sets up an AI agent with reasoning capabilities using specific models and configurations, and demonstrates its usage by asking a comparison question.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent capable of reasoning and interacting with models.

classes.name: Groq
classes.description: A model class representing the Groq language model.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response of the agent to a given prompt, optionally in markdown format.
